GK20bhasdutu:12: evamāryamiśrān vijñāpayāmi| aye kiṃ nu khalu mayi vijñāpanavyagre śabda iva
GK20bhasdutu:16: bho bhoḥ pratihārādhikṛtāḥ mahārājo duryodhanaḥ samājñāpayati|
GK20bhasdutu:21: niṣkrāntaḥ| sthāpanā| tataḥ praviśati kāñcukīyaḥ| kāñcukīyaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:22: bho bhoḥ pratihārādhikṛtāḥ mahārājo duryodhanaḥ samājñāpayati| adya
GK20bhasdutu:24: mantrayitumicchāmi| tadāhūyantāṃ sarve rājāna iti|parikramyāvalokya|aye ayaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:29: tataḥ praviśati yathānirdiṣṭo duryodhanaḥ| duryodhanaḥ uddhūtaroṣamiva me
GK20bhasdutu:31: raṇotsavamimaṃ sahasā vicintya| icchāmi pāṇḍavabale varavāraṇānā-
GK20bhasdutu:40: āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau ucyatām| asti mamaikādaśākṣauhiṇībalasamudayaḥ| asya
GK20bhasdutu:45: ācārya abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| pitāmaha abhivādaye| praviśatu
GK20bhasdutu:46: bhavānmantraśālām| mātula abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| āryau
GK20bhasdutu:47: vaikarṇavarṣadevau praviśatāṃ bhavantau| bho bhoḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ svairaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:50: praviśya|ācārya etatkūrmāsanam| āsyatām| pitāmaha etatsiṃhāsanam| āsyatām| mātula
GK20bhasdutu:51: etaccarmāsanam| āsyatām| āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau āsātāṃ bhavantau| bho bhoḥ
GK20bhasdutu:53: svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ| kimiti kimiti| mahārājo nāsta iti| aho sevādharmaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:61: kimāha mātulaḥ| atrabhavati gāṅgeye sthite ko.anyaḥ senāpatirbhavitumarhatīti|
GK20bhasdutu:63: bhavatu bhavatu pitāmaha eva bhavatu| vayamapyetadabhilaṣāmaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:66: patitairabhiṣekatoyaiḥ sārdhaṃ patantu hṛdayāni narādhipānām|| 5|| praviśya|
GK20bhasdutu:68: jayatu mahārājaḥ| eṣa khalu pāṇḍavaskandhāvārāddautyenāgataḥ puruṣottamo
GK20bhasdutu:71: mā tāvat| bho bādarāyaṇa kiṃ kiṃ kaṃsabhṛtyo dāmodarastava puruṣottamaḥ| sa
GK20bhasdutu:75: bhṛtyajanasya samudācāraḥ| sagarvaṃ khalvasya vacanam| ā apadhvaṃsa|
GK20bhasdutu:77: prasīdatu mahārājaḥ| saṃbhrameṇa samudācāro vismṛtaḥ|pādayoḥ patati|
GK20bhasdutu:79: saṃbhrama iti| ā manuṣyāṇāmastyeva saṃbhramaḥ| uttiṣṭhotiṣṭha|
GK20bhasdutu:83: idānīṃ prasanno.asmi| ka eṣa dūtaḥ prāptaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:87: keśava iti| evameṣṭavyam| ayameva samudācāraḥ| bho bho rājānaḥ dautyenāgatasya
GK20bhasdutu:90: kimāhurbhavantaḥ| arghyapradānena pūjayitavyaḥ keśava iti| na me rocate|
GK20bhasdutu:93: grahaṇamupagate tu vāsubhadre hṛtanayanā iva pāṇḍavā bhaveyuḥ| gatimatirahiteṣu
GK20bhasdutu:96: api ca yo.atra keśavasya pratyutthāsyati sa mayā dvādaśasuvarṇabhāreṇa daṇḍyaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:98: bhavantu bhavantaḥ|ātmagatam|ko nu khalvidānīṃ mamāpratyutthānasyopāyaḥ| hanta
GK20bhasdutu:100: upāyaḥ|prakāśam|bādarāyaṇa ānīyatāṃ sa citrapaṭo nanu yatra
GK20bhasdutu:105: yadājñāpayati mahārājaḥ|niṣkramya praviśya|jayatu mahārājaḥ| ayaṃ sa citrapaṭaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:111: aho darśanīyo.ayaṃ citrapaṭaḥ| eṣa duḥśāsano draupadīṃ keśahaste gṛhītavān| eṣā
GK20bhasdutu:116: eṣa durātmā bhīmaḥ sarvarājasamakṣamavamānitāṃ draupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK20bhasdutu:122: roṣākulākṣaḥ sphuritādharoṣṭhastṛṇāya matvā ripumaṇḍalaṃ tat| utsādayiṣyanniva
GK20bhasdutu:128: vigatamaraṇaśaṅkau satvaraṃ bhrātaraṃ me harimiva mṛgapotau tejasābhiprayātau||
GK20bhasdutu:131: nīco.ahameva viparītamatiḥ kathaṃ vā roṣaṃ parityajatamadya nayānayajñau|
GK20bhasdutu:134: akṣānkṣipansa kitavaḥ prahasansagarvaṃ saṃkocayanniva mudaṃ dviṣatāṃ
GK20bhasdutu:136: drupadarājasutāṃ rudantīṃ kākṣeṇa paśyati likhatyapi gāṃ nayajñaḥ|| 12||
GK20bhasdutu:137: etāvācāryapitāmahau tāṃ dṛṣṭvā lajjāyamānau paṭāntāntarhitamukhau sthitau| aho
GK20bhasdutu:139: varṇāḍhyatā| aho bhāvopapannatā| aho yuktalekhatā| suvyaktamālikhito.ayaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:150: prāptaḥ kilādya vacanādiha pāṇḍavānāṃ dautyena bhṛtya iva kṛṣṇamatiḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:152: sakhe tvamapi sajjaya karṇa karṇau nārīmṛdūni vacanāni yudhiṣṭhirasya|| 13|| tataḥ

GK20bhasdutu:162: āvāsāḥ pārthivānāṃ surapurasadṛśāḥ svacchandavihitā vistīrṇāḥ śastraśālā
GK20bhasdutu:167: duṣṭavādī guṇadveṣī śaṭhaḥ svajananirdayaḥ| suyodhano hi māṃ dṛṣṭvā naiva
GK20bhasdutu:174: praviśya| kathaṃ kathaṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntāḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ| alamalaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:178: kathaṃ kathaṃ keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntāḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ| alamalaṃ saṃbhrameṇa|
GK20bhasdutu:184: utsāhena matiṃ kṛtvāpyāsīno.asmi samāhitaḥ| keśavasya prabhāvena
GK20bhasdutu:188: ācārya āsyatāṃ| gāṅgeyapramukhā rājānaḥ svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:191: suyodhano.ayaṃ svajanāvamānaṃ parākramaṃ paśyati bāliśatvāt| ko nāma loke
GK20bhasdutu:200: dharmātmajo vāyusutaśca bhīmo bhrātārjuno me tridaśendrasūnuḥ| yamau ca
GK20bhasdutu:203: sadṛśametadgāndhārīputrasya| atha kimatha kim| kuśalinaḥ sarve| bhavato rājye
GK20bhasdutu:205: bāhyābhyantare ca kuśalamanāmayaṃ ca pṛṣṭvā vijñāpayanti yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:207: anubhūtaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ saṃpūrṇaḥ samayaḥ sa ca| asmākamapi dharmyaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:213: vane pitṛvyo mṛgayāprasaṃgataḥ kṛtāparādho muniśāpamāptavān| tadāprabhṛtyeva sa
GK20bhasdutu:214: dāraniḥspṛhaḥ parātmajānāṃ pitṛtāṃ kathaṃ vrajet|| 21|| vāsudevaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:216: vicitravīryo viṣayī vipattiṃ kṣayeṇa yātaḥ punarambikāyām| vyāsena jāto
GK20bhasdutu:220: evaṃ parasparavirodhavivardhanena śīghraṃ bhavetkurukulaṃ nṛpa nāmaśeṣam|
GK20bhasdutu:225: rājyaṃ nāma nṛpātmajaiḥ sahṛdairjitvā ripūnbhujyate talloke na tu yācyate na tu
GK20bhasdutu:227: dīyate| kāṅkṣā cennṛpatitvamāptumacirātkurvantu te sāhasaṃ svairaṃ vā praviśantu
GK20bhasdutu:233: syālaṃ tava gurorbhūpaṃ kaṃsaṃ na te dayā| kathamasmākamevaṃ syātteṣu
GK20bhasdutu:237: kṛtvā putraviyogārtāṃ bahuśo jananīṃ mama| vṛddhaṃ svapitaraṃ baddhvā hato.ayaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:240: sarvathā vañcitastvayā kaṃsaḥ| alamātmastavena| na śauryametat| paśya|
GK20bhasdutu:244: bhoḥ suyodhana deśakālāvasthāpekṣitaṃ khalu śauryaṃ nayānugāminām| iha
GK20bhasdutu:247: kartavyo bhrātṛṣu sneho vismartavyā guṇetarāḥ| saṃbandho bandhubhiḥ
GK20bhasdutu:249: 29|| duryodhanaḥ devātmajairmanuṣyāṇāṃ kathaṃ vā bandhutā bhavet|
GK20bhasdutu:252: prasādyamānaḥ sāmnāyaṃ na svabhāvaṃ vimuñcati| hanta saṃkṣobhayāmyenaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:255: prakāśam|bhoḥ suyodhana kiṃ na jānīṣe.arjunasya balaparākramam|
GK20bhasdutu:260: kairātaṃ vapurāsthitaḥ paśupatiryuddhena saṃtoṣito vahneḥ khāṇḍavamaśnataḥ
GK20bhasdutu:262: śaraiśchāditā| devendrārtikarā nivātakavacā nītāḥ kṣayaṃ līlayā nanvekena tadā
GK20bhasdutu:266: nanu tvaṃ citrasenena nīyamāno nabhastalam| vikrośanghoṣayātrāyāṃ phalgunenaiva
GK20bhasdutu:269: dātumarhasi madvākyādrājyārdhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraja| anyathā sāgarāntāṃ gāṃ hariṣyanti
GK20bhasdutu:273: praharati yadi yuddhe māruto bhīmarūpī praharati yadi sākṣātpārtharūpeṇa śakraḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:274: paruṣavacanadakṣa tvadvacobhirna dāsye tṛṇamapi pitṛbhukte vīryagupte svarājye||
GK20bhasdutu:276: bhoḥ kurukulakalaṅkabhūta ayaśolubdha vayaṃ kila tṛṇāntarābhibhāṣakāḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:279: avadhyāṃ pramadāṃ hatvā hayaṃ govṛṣameva ca| mallānapi sunirlajjo vaktumicchasi
GK20bhasdutu:288: gaccha gaccha paśukhuroddhatareṇurūpitāṅgo vrajameva| viphalīkṛtaḥ kālaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:290: evamastu| na vayamanuktasaṃdeśā gantumicchāmaḥ| tadākarṇyatāṃ yudhiṣṭhirasya
GK20bhasdutu:297: na vyāharati kila māṃ suyodhanaḥ| bhoḥ
GK20bhasdutu:302: kathaṃ yāsyati kila keśavaḥ| duḥśāsana durmarṣaṇa durmukha durbuddhe
GK20bhasdutu:304: dūtasamudācāramatikrāntaḥ keśavo badhyatām| kathamaśaktāḥ| duḥśāsana na
GK20bhasdutu:310: ayamaśaktaḥ| mātula badhyatāmayaṃ keśavaḥ| kathaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ patati| bhavatu|
GK20bhasdutu:314: kathaṃ baddhukāmo māṃ kila suyodhanaḥ| bhavatu| suyodhanasya sāmarthyaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:318: sṛjasi yadi samantāddevamāyāḥ svamāyāḥ praharasi yadi vā tvaṃ durnivāraiḥ
GK20bhasdutu:320: hayagajavṛṣabhāṇāṃ pātanājjātadarpo narapatigaṇamadhye badhyase tvaṃ mayādya||
GK20bhasdutu:322: āḥ tiṣṭhedānīm| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| aho hrasvatvaṃ keśavasya|
GK20bhasdutu:324: tiṣṭhedānīm| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| aho dīrghatvaṃ keśavasya|
GK20bhasdutu:326: dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| sarvatra mantraśālāyāṃ keśavā bhavanti| kimidānīṃ
GK20bhasdutu:328: bhavatu dṛṣṭam| bho bho rājānaḥ ekenaikaḥ keśavo badhyatām| kathaṃ svayameva
GK20bhasdutu:330: patanti rājānaḥ| sādhu bho jambhaka sādhu|
GK20bhasdutu:336: bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ kāryamahameva sādhayāmi| bhoḥ sudarśana itastāvat|
GK20bhasdutu:339: śrutvā giraṃ bhagavato vipulaprasādā- nnirdhāvito.asmi parivāritatoyadaughaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:341: prakupitaḥ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kasyādya mūrdhani mayā pravijṛmbhitavyam|| 42||
GK20bhasdutu:347: khalvāpaḥ| bhagavati ākāśagaṅge āpastāvat| hanta sravati|ācamyopasṛtya|jayatu
GK20bhasdutu:356: kathaṃ kathaṃ karmakāla iti| ājñāpayatu bhagavānājñāpayatu|
GK20bhasdutu:357: kiṃ merumandarakulaṃ parivartayāmi saṃkṣobhayāmi sakalaṃ makarālayaṃ vā|
GK20bhasdutu:358: nakṣatravaṃśamakhilaṃ bhuvi pātayāmi nāśakyamasti mama deva tava prasādāt|| 44||
GK20bhasdutu:361: yadi lavaṇajalaṃ vā kandaraṃ vā girīṇāṃ grahagaṇacaritaṃ vā vāyumārgaṃ prayāsi|
GK20bhasdutu:363: bhujabalayogaprāptasaṃjātavegaṃ bhavatu capala cakraṃ kālacakraṃ tavādya|| 45||
GK20bhasdutu:366: mahībhārāpanayanaṃ kartuṃ jātasya bhūtale| asminnevaṃ gate deva nanu
GK20bhasdutu:371: yadājñāpayati bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| kathaṃ kathaṃ gopālaka iti| tricaraṇātikrāntatriloko
GK20bhasdutu:372: nārāyaṇaḥ khalvatra bhagavān| śaraṇaṃ vrajantu bhavantaḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye
GK20bhasdutu:376: kanakakhacitapṛṣṭhaṃ bhāti kṛṣṇasya pārśve navasaliladapārśve cāruvidyullekheva||
GK20bhasdutu:378: bho bhoḥ śārṅga praśāntaroṣo bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta
GK20bhasdutu:384: he kaumodaki praśāntaroṣo bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| hanta nivṛttā| yāvadgacchāmi| aye
GK20bhasdutu:389: he pāñcajanya praśāntaroṣo bhagavān| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ| aye
GK20bhasdutu:392: vanitāvigraho yuddhe mahāsurabhayaṃkaraḥ| prayāti gagane śīghraṃ maholkeva
GK20bhasdutu:394: he nandaka praśāntaroṣo bhagavān| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:397: so.ayaṃ khaḍgaḥ kharāṃśorapahasitatanuḥ svaiḥ karairnandakākhyaḥ seyaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:400: cāpayaṣṭiḥ so.ayaṃ gambhīraghoṣaḥ śaśikaraviśadaḥ śaṅkharāṭpāñcajanyaḥ|| 51|| he
GK20bhasdutu:401: śārṅga kaumodaki pāñcajanya daityāntakṛnnandaka śatruvahne| praśāntaroṣo
GK20bhasdutu:404: hanta nivṛttāḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye atyuddhūto vāyuḥ| atitapatyādityaḥ| calitāḥ
GK20bhasdutu:406: kṣubdhāḥ sāgarāḥ| patitā vṛkṣāḥ| bhrāntā meghāḥ| pralīnā vāsukiprabhṛtayo
GK20bhasdutu:407: bhujaṃgeśvarāḥ| kiṃ nu khalvidam| aye ayaṃ bhagavato vāhanaḥ garuḍaḥ prāptaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:411: he kāśyapapriyasuta garuḍa praśāntaroṣo bhagavāndevadeveśaḥ| gamyatāṃ
GK20bhasdutu:414: ete sthitā viyati kiṃnarayakṣasiddhāḥ devāśca saṃbhramacalanmukuṭottamāṅgāḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:416: vigatakāntiguṇāḥ praśāntaṃ śrutvā śrayanti sadanāni nivṛttatāpāḥ|| 54||
GK20bhasdutu:423: aye vṛddharājasvara iva| bho rājan eṣa sthito.asmi|
GK20bhasdutu:425: kva nu khalu bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| kva nu khalu bhagavānpāṇḍavaśreyaskaraḥ| kva nu
GK20bhasdutu:428: mama putrāparādhāttu śārṅgapāṇe tavādhunā| etanme tridaśādhyākṣa pādayoḥ
GK20bhasdutu:433: anugṛhīto.asmi| bhagavan idamarghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca pratigṛhyatām|
GK20bhasdutu:435: sarvaṃ gṛhṇāmi| kiṃ te bhūyaḥ priyamupaharāmi|
GK20bhasdutu:443: mahīmekātapatrāṅkāṃ rājasiṃhaḥ praśāstu naḥ|| 56|| niṣkrāntāḥ sarve| dūtavākyaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:446: nārāyaṇaḥ khalvatra bhagavān| śaraṇaṃ vrajantu bhavantaḥ| yāvadga
